plot: Ava, Alan and Sam are locked up in a cell with just an apple to eat. As an outer voice tells them to eat the fruit, they wander if they should or not, fearing the consequences.
title: La Pomme
plot_es: Ava, Alan and Sam are locked up in a cell with just an apple to eat. As an outer voice tells them to eat the fruit, they wander if they should or not, fearing the consequences.
plot_en: Ava, Alan and Sam are locked up in a cell with just an apple to eat. As an outer voice tells them to eat the fruit, they wander if they should or not, fearing the consequences.
